thread.section_title: Ibis Styles Paris 15 Lecourbe - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great value hotel
thread.title_full: Great value hotel - Review of Ibis Styles Paris 15 Lecourbe, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: K0159
title: Great value hotel
text:
We booked this hotel for the rugby, the lot of us (15!) and everyone enjoyed it.
The hotel is lovely, neat and and very comfortable beds!! Towels changed everyday if required and beds made etc. Breakfast was always stocked up and the fresh orange machine was a nice touch.
Staff were very friendly and accommodating - big thanks for having us 15 Scots staying with you!! (we loved the photos you took of us on game day!!)
The hotel is well situated, we walked to most of the tourist spots and there is also metro's very close by, including a supermarket across the road.
Very well priced and good services. Thanks again for having us. Would stay again!
